Message:
At what felt like my
100th master’s estate,
I was finally captured by
the Knights of Longinus.
My master was such a nice man.

He knew I was a witch,
yet still let me stay with him...

But...he was just keeping me
so that he could hand me over
to the Church.
I was never truly welcome there.

I wonder if witches aren’t
allowed to have dreams...

I wanted to become
a handmaiden and
be of use to others...

...but I guess that dream
will never come true.

the knights that were
dragging me away went flying,

and a strange man and woman
rescued me.
The place they brought me to...
the new mansion I was to work at.
